title: Neet 2024 even results of some students were discarded .
selftext: Girl whose result was discarded. The girl had worked her year in preparation and they will discard it just cause OMR sheet was torn. If automated OMR evaluation is not working they can use a manual method. Or was this done intentionally to sabotage the result.
comments: we Indians are with you. This system f\*cked us badly.
Is NEET not a computerized test because there aren't enough computers? Maybe they can conduct it like JEE Mains with multiple shifts.
This girls is a fraud, whatever mail she is showing in the video is from some unknown source most probably she did all this for fame.
Source: I am an andhbhakt

Guys upvote it. 

This is a scam of magnanimous level. Please visit, learn and review the results and you will likely infer someone is literally selling the seats with co-ordination of people in high level.

It is verified. There is court order also posted. 

Have a look.
No it's exposed she changed her application number 3 with 8 check
So where is the source?
Wai on sec
She is fraud, most probably a move by NTA to disregard claims and PIL’s filed by people
https://preview.redd.it/opfbc7e70t5d1.png?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=0c8b9c236cd41c9e04a67dbf607c478bd3d1e5b7

This is her real application no. : 240411340741

And her DOB: 07/11/2003

check for yourself.

Can you explain what you mean? Some say she is fraud because she is trying to discredit NTA. You seem to be saying she is fraud because she somehow discredits other PILs. So many people saying she is fraud but for opposite reasons

Its was just my opinion that this was planned and executed by NTA, to divert the public attention, alakh sir said that many fake cases are arising amidst all of these chaos, they are trying to suppress the voices of those who are truly affected(NEET students)

True even I checked… comments on that video is also turned off.. it’s just a scam.

https://preview.redd.it/wr28109y9t5d1.jpeg?width=1170&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=959aecc56d0166d25681cbe561cedf368bd3124e
https://preview.redd.it/qjkv25epot5d1.jpeg?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=fb73a26255d4d7c3cd99303bc44604c50ea7af13
this is fake
Lol https://youtu.be/ch9uNpsy7rM?si=KBVtbE6NxWeY6tvT
https://youtu.be/ch9uNpsy7rM?si=KBVtbE6NxWeY6tvT
Oh my god… OG artist
Depression kya hai bhai ? Someone cheated me , so I am going into depression ??? What the hell !!
The source is right below you, how does it feel now?
That's just a bullshit excuse. If Bank exams can be conducted using computerized test then definitely Neet can have it similarly.

Link for the marksheet 
https://neet.ntaonline.in/frontend/web/scorecard/resultqr?applicationNumber=240411340741&apprefno=NTA739877941

Ahh yes COVID 19 ki vaccine bnane wali didi ki neet bhi clear ho hai hai but result nahi de rahe neet wale. Ese wahiyad scammers hi apda mai avsar dundhkar apna matlab sadhne mai Lage rhete hai jisse Jo asli victim's  hai uski authenticity km hoti jati hai in short these society cancer's are the other reason why we are an falling society
this girl also claimed that she made covid vaccine in 2020
Man everything is a fraud these days
Thanks. Seems I reacted too quickly.
Since it's there, I have changed my mind.
Source:https://youtu.be/ch9uNpsy7rM?si=KBVtbE6NxWeY6tvT
